author: Frank Rich
title: Frank Rich: Trump’s War on the States
description: The president can’t tell governors when to reopen society. But he can whip his supporters into a tea party–style frenzy.
content:
Most weeks, New York Magazine writer-at-large Frank Rich speaks with contributor Alex Carp about the biggest stories in politics and culture. Today, the multistate coronavirus recovery plans, and Trumps decision to put his name on stimulus checks. 
After wee… [+8584 chars]
